name: 吉塔
objective: Clean Energy is an English course and it will cover the fundamentals and applications of renewable energy sources and reactors for the generation of alternative energy. Classes about the basics of Bio-energy, their production and sustainable usage will be discussed. Detailed descriptions about the Environmental pollution, Climate change and Energy crisis will be taught in this introductory course
schedule:
Week 1: Clean energy- An Introduction 
Week 2: Global Crisis and Climate change
Week 3: Renewable and alternative energy sources
Week 4: The world of Biofuels 
Week 5: Biomass conversion technologies 
Week 6: Bio-based products
Week 7: Microbial energy 
Week 8: Important definitions
Week 9: Midterm Exam 
Week 10: Bioelectrochemical systems 
Week 11: Innovative Integrated Technologies 
Week 12: Innovative case studies  
Week 13: Algal energy 
Week 14: Environmental impacts
Week 15: Environmental  pollution
Week 16: Bioremediation technologies
Week 17: Feasible future perspectives
Week 18: Final Exam
